extendedInfo.description: A unique, touch-based racing game developed by RedLynx, the creators of Trials HD, DrawRace 2: Racing Evolved is the groundbreaking sequel to the critically acclaimed DrawRace and improves on its predecessor in every way, from the inclusion of a new turbo button, a host of online options, and new, highly detailed 3D tracks.**Runs beautifully on tablets**â¢ Huge single player campaign with over 180 challenges, a gymkhana skill game and tons of content to unlock. â¢ Realistic car physics, learn how each one handles and find the perfect racing line. â¢ Gorgeous, highly detailed 3D tracks featuring ramps, slopes and tilts to test your driving skills. â¢ Drive everything from Arctic Rally cars, to V12 Supercars in your quest to become the champion. â¢ Race against your friends with hot seat or online through the all-new Friend Challenge mode. â¢ Use the Turbo Button wisely to gain the edge over your opponents.

reviews.title: Crashed
reviews.comment: After paying and even buying the VIP pack, it crashed on Galaxy Note 2. Rip off. I want my money back
reviews.author: Paul Chavez

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work for Samsung II
reviews.comment: I want my money back, barely have been able to play a whole game since I purchased this app on my a Samsung galaxy II. From what I did play, it was an enjoyable game.....but to pay money for an enjoyable game that doesn\'t work, Is a no no. Waiting on either a refund or an update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jake Says Awesome!
reviews.comment: This game is awesome! High quality no issues excellent graphics you will love it! Chillingo always makes a good game! Now all they need to do is make CATCH THE ARK for the Google Play Store. Are you listening CHILLINGO? Catch The Ark!
reviews.author: Jacob Oxenhandler

reviews.title: Took my money but won\'t let me play
reviews.comment: Several days after buying, I am still unable to play because apparently this game is not available in my country. I get a \"server error\" when the game tries to download something.  They had no qualms about taking my money though. It\'s too bad, because this is a great game that I used to love on the iPhone.
reviews.author: Samer Kurdi

reviews.title: Broken on new Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Installs and plays fine on my Nexus 4 on the same network, but on Nexus 7 it fails with a server error when trying to download additional data. Same OS (4.3), only differences are hardware and running as second user profile on tablet.
reviews.author: Jason Birch

reviews.title: sucks dont buy!
reviews.comment: So i played the game on and i pad and wanted to get it on my phone so i paid 2.99 and now it says i need 250 mb to run it and to download that 250 but i have 500 mb left!
reviews.author: jordan montalbo

reviews.title: NEEDS UPDATE!
reviews.comment: One of my top favorite time wasting games untill you try to make in game downlosds, then it crashes the game and won\'t load back up. VERY dissapointed that I spend 2.99 on the super car just for it not to show up and the game not to load which was another 2.99...
reviews.author: Kolten h

reviews.title: Supercar? Superno...
reviews.comment: This game works great supercar. Once I bought that it crashes everytime I start it up. It is made the game useless.
reviews.author: Evan Beccaccio

reviews.title: Its on and pop n
reviews.comment: Just downloaded this game and im love in it!
reviews.author: Donald GATLING

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on my new nexus 7. What gives?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun and quickly addicting
reviews.comment: Good game for a phone doesn\'t rely on my fat finger on the screen during the race or crazy titling.  Great game
reviews.author: Robbie Barry

reviews.title: Server error on nexus 7
reviews.comment: I have enjoyed this game on my galaxy nexus, but it gets a server error 5002 on my nexus 7
reviews.author: Jeff Brown

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: The game kept crashing can you guys check it out to sure it\'s working properly please so I can give it the rightful stars it deserve thank
reviews.author: Michael Ellis

reviews.title: It wont work (Never Mind)
reviews.comment: It stopped downloading when I first went on the app, I checked on it an hour later to find it never even progressed 1 percent since I left, so I exited the app. Now I cant even use it, even after re-installing. It sucks because I like this game (Its working now! Amazing app!)
reviews.author: Jacob Knappett

reviews.title: Addicting
reviews.comment: I like this game. But on my gs2, after drawing the 2 laps. It freezes and exits. Please fix this.
reviews.author: Carlos Sierra

reviews.title: Enjoyable
reviews.comment: I usually don\'t like racing games. I usually am a terrible driver. This makes it easier to play on at touch screen. Love it.
reviews.author: D Nguyen

reviews.title: Hidden Gem
reviews.comment: I bought this game a week or so ago played it once and than not again untik today. I have to say when you really start playing you get caught up in mastering the ability to draw the perfect line! This game is hours of fun and progressively gets more difficult, allowing you to master the skills needed to win. Worth every cent I paid for it!
reviews.author: John Pietersma

reviews.title: Best game ever!!!
reviews.comment: Game won\'t the world league tonight.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I usually never leave reviews but...
reviews.comment: THIS GAME IS AMAZING!!! I RECOMMEND THIS FOR ANYONE!!!
reviews.author: EL FUERTE

reviews.title: Fun on a big screen
reviews.comment: This game is great on my 10inch tablet.   It is still fun on the Note 2 but it\'s harder to be precise.
reviews.author: Andrew Howes
